name: Battleship Earth
description:
The year is 3020. Earth is in danger of an expanding Sun that will consume most of the Solar System. The world has banded together to hack the planet in order to turn Earth into a giant spaceship. No, a battleship.

Hack and blast your way out of this solar system.

Controls:

Mouse recommended, click to shoot, can hold to auto-fire at max fire rate

Alternatively, 

WASD or Arrow keys to move and Spacebar to shoot

Credits:

Programming, Art, UI, Design : Rumbeard 

SFX & Music: Unity free assets
